thread.title_full: 'Sandwich King' Jeff Mauro highlights Chicago food - WBEZ Chicago

author: Ari Mejia
title: 'Sandwich King' Jeff Mauro highlights Chicago food - WBEZ Chicago
text:
Food Network’s Jeff Mauro loves Chicago and its sandwiches
Jeff Mauro aka the “Sandwich King” keeps Chicago food at the forefront of his stardom.
James Vitullo
Proud Chicago native Jeff Mauro centers Chicago delicacies and culture as a celebrity chef. He hosted the Emmy-nominated show “Sandwich King” on Food Network where he currently co-hosts “The Kitchen.” Though “Sandwich King” ran from 2011 to 2014, he still keeps his sandwich kingdom alive by way of his Instagram where he documents his travels around Chicagoland and gives local sandwiches ratings on his 6-pointed star scale. Mauro is also a musician and comedian.
Reset learns more about Mauro’s career and passion for Chicago sandwiches.
GUEST: Jeff Mauro, co-host of “The Kitchen” on Food Network; owner of Mauro Provisions
